search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

results.title: Report a missed bin collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: If your rubbish, recycling, food or garden waste has not been collected, you can report it to us as a missed collection.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can only report a missed collection within 2 working days. If you report it more than two working days after your collection day, it'll be collected on ...

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can report a missed collection online. You can call or email us if there is another problem with this service.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: If we missed your collection by mistake, we'll reschedule collection for the next working day after you report it. You can only report it within 2 working days.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: You can only report it within 2 working days. After this you will have to wait for your next collection. If you have put the wrong items in ...

results.title: Report a missed collection
results.snippet: This form is for reporting a missed refuse, reycling, garden or food waste collection. Continue. Step 1: Find your address. Use my current location. Number.

results.title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Tell us if your collection is missed, or if there is another problem with your collection. Report it by calling 020 7926 9000.

results.title: Rubbish and Recycling | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Report a missed bin collection Email: StreetCareCallCentre@lambeth.gov.uk Telephone: 020 7926 9000.

results.title: Street cleaning, rubbish and recycling | Lambeth Council
results.snippet: Check your bin collection day · Report a missed bin collection · Rubbish collections · Recycling collections · Waste collection calendars · Waste reduction ...

results.title: Container requests
results.snippet: You can also report broken domestic and commercial bins, request additional commercial bins, and request a larger domestic refuse bin if you fit the criteria.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin collection | Lambeth Council
Key Strengths: Direct link for reporting missed bin collections
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides a straightforward method to report a missed bin collection directly on the Lambeth Council website, which is the most suitable resource for council customer information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed collection | Lambeth Council
Key Strengths: Clear instructions for reporting missed collections
Specifies reporting process within 2 working days
Recommendations.Reasoning: The title of this resource explicitly mentions a missed collection and it provides clear directions about the reporting procedure, making it an effective choice for customer information.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed collection
Key Strengths: Form for reporting various types of waste collections
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource offers a one-stop solution for reporting different types of waste collections, while its straightforward design enhances usability.

Recommendations.Title: Rubbish and Recycling | Lambeth Council
Key Strengths: Direct contact details for rubbish and recycling inquiries
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides the direct contact information for rubbish and recycling inquiries, enabling customers to easily reach out to the council for assistance when needed.

Recommendations.Title: Street cleaning, rubbish and recycling | Lambeth Council
Key Strengths: Provides a comprehensive resource for various waste services
Includes information about bin collection days and calendars
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not the primary method for reporting missed collections, this resource offers valuable information about street cleaning, rubbish, and recycling services in Lambeth.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The analysis was focused on identifying resources relevant to reporting missed bin or waste collection issues. All provided resources were related and from the same source - Lambeth Council's website.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: While most resources offered different ways to report a missed collection, some provided more detailed information about various types of waste services.
